GoalAssignment.name: GoalAssignment
GoalAssignment.description: Represents the assignment of a goal.

CompletionDate.description: The date when the goal is completed.

CompletionPercentage.description: Indicates the progress made on the assigned goal in percentage.

CustomGoalName.description: A custom name that can be defined for the goal assignment. If this field is empty, the goal definition name is used for the goal assignment.

Description.description: The description of the goal assignment record.

GoalAssigneeId.description: The assigees associated with the goal assignment.

GoalDefinitionId.description: The goal definition associated with the goal assignment.

DescriptionCodeId.description: The system-defined code that represents the description of a standardized goal.

GoalType.description: Specifies if the goal applies to a group or an individual.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the goal assignment record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the goal assignment record owner.

ParentRecordId.description: The care plan or benefit assignment object associated with the goal assignment.

Priority.description: Specifies the priority of the goal assignment.

StartDate.description: The start date of the assigned goal.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the assigned goal.

TargetCompletionDate.description: The date by when the assigned goal is targeted to be completed.
